name: IOU of Quadratic Funding by Vitalik Buterin
description: In December 2018, in their paper ‘Liberal Radicalism: A Flexible Design For Philanthropic Matching Funds’ Vitalik Buterin, Zoe Hitzig, and E Glen Weyl put forward an innovative model called Quadratic Funding, which could form the basis of a new general purpose infrastructure for the funding of public goods. In principle the model incentivizes individuals to voluntarily contribute amounts that together signal to a government how much society as a whole values a public good, how much should be spent on it, and where that funding should be directed. Vitalik’s Cryptograph is his hand drawn representation of this groundbreaking Quadratic Funding formula.  Learn more about Vitalik Buterin: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vitalik_Buterin  See more on the Cryptograph website: https://www.cryptograph.co/Cryptograph/1
feeDescription: A Transfer Fee of 15% of it's last sold price need to be paid in order to transfer this Cryptograph
